content.rendered:
Tuesday, October 23, 2024 

Today is a “C” Day 

Club Meetings and Information 

  •  Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – There will be a meeting in the Large Group Room after school with Ms. Schnorr on Wednesday, October 23. Please check the Pop Culture Icon Club Canvas page for additional information. See you there! 

  • MAGSA’s next meeting will be after school on Wednesday, October 23rd in room E138. See Mr. Kane with any questions. 
     
  • Friday Oct 25 is blue out day! Show your support for our varsity football team by dressing in all blue. 
     
  • 6th graders!! There will be a Halloween dance this Friday, October 25, here at Maple from 7pm to 9pm. Join us for food, dancing, and fun! It will be a spooktacular time! Tickets will be sold online only through ParentSquare. You are encouraged to wear a costume but it is not required, however, keep in mind there can be nothing covering your face and no toy weapons will be allowed. We hope to see you there!! 
     
  • 6th, 7th, & 8th Graders! Get your order forms in for our annual Poinsettia and Wreath Sale! Order forms and money are due no later than Monday, October 28 to the WDC station located outside Student Services. It may seem early to order these holiday plants but get them before they are gone! All proceeds for this fundraiser provides aid for our students in need here at Maple Avenue. 
     
  • Best Buddies is BACK at Maple Ave! Our first meeting will be on October 30th 2:30-3:00 in the Large Group Room. Come and find out more about this awesome club! Contact Miss Douglas with any questions! 

  •  Math club will be meeting today after school in room R232. All students grades 6-8 are welcome 

  • There is a student council meeting after school on Wednesday in Mrs. Kerls room

  • The International Club is meeting in room 255 right after school today! Everyone is welcome to join! 

 

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 
 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
